name: One Button, One Game
description:
Have one finger and tired of all these games which require MULTIPLE buttons to be pressed at once?


Well be awakened my sun.

This game will open your eyes to the one true button. The spacebar.

Use it.

Live it.

Love it.


V2 Update
  • Spacebar 18x = Invincibility for 5 seconds!
  • Enemies can now shoot bullets!
  • Enemy bullets leave shrapnel which kills you!!
